roleset.name: experience a (typically minor and/or irregular) snag

example.name: glitch-n, ARG1
example.text: The only glitch is that after you get your FM-3 you must enter Mexico within a certain time period .

propbank.arg: that after you get your FM-3 you must enter Mexico within a certain time period

example.name: glitch-v, ARG0
example.text: her job involves troubleshooting when systems glitch

example.name: glitch-v, both args (rare)
example.text: the end - game flag always glitched such that the score would keep tallying past a victory condition or the mandatory retirement year

propbank.arg: such that the score would keep tallying past a victory condition or the mandatory retirement year

example.name: glitch-n, ARG0 in PP
example.text: Earlier this year , NASA shifted the telescope into a new operational mode to work around a recurring glitch with one of its gyroscopes
